mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile navigation by making menu options more accessible and adjusting image sizes for quicker loading.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and utilize lazy loading to reduce load time, especially on mobile.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance on-page SEO by including more keyword-rich content and optimizing meta descriptions and alt tags.
userExperienceTip: Improve site navigation by providing clearer call-to-action buttons and enhancing accessibility features.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking flow by reducing the number of steps required to complete a reservation.
